Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Professor', 3: "Your Tantalum-193 affinity is almost perfect. You'll be an excellent subject.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Professor', 3: "Also, you asked, and I checked—your HLA matches with your younger brother's. But, are you sure about this?", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Morian', 3: 'As long as you keep your end of the bargain—the money for the surgery, an urgent slot for the operation, a guaranteed normal life for Murray afterward, and... my heart transplantation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Professor', 3: 'Not only so, but I\'ll also ensure your younger brother the highest degree of privileges for the rest of his life, even... a ticket to "Babylonia".', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Professor', 3: "I did also test your brother's Tantalum-193 affinity, and it's also quite high. Would you perhaps consider an artificial heart for him? Then you wouldn't have to take this risk.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Morian', 3: "Don't even think about touching my brother. I know full well the danger of your experiments. You're gambling with our lives. I'll take the risk, so that my brother can stay out of this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Professor', 3: "Don't be so pessimistic, if the experiment succeeds, you'll...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Professor', 3: "...Anyway, I'll have someone bring him here before the experiment begins. Don't worry, he'll get the best of the best.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Professor', 3: 'A first-class doctor will be performing the surgery for your brother when our experiment begins.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Professor', 3: 'Go meet him for one last time... your last time as a human.', 4: '2'}
